name: Allen Anderson
bio: Hi my name is Allen! I just started my job at Microsoft earlier this year and I couldn't be happier. I grew up in Bothell but I never really took school seriously and started to fall behind in my classes. I was lucky enough to have a teacher take me under their wings and help me find my passion in graphic design.

name: Bill Bonds
bio: Hi my name is Bill! I've been a nurse for about 8 years now. My mom was an inspiration for me to become a nurse. If you ever want to know about the medical world, feel free to chat with me!

name: Courtney Crouse
bio: Hello, my name is Courtney and I'm a lawyer! As an adopted child, I totally understand what it is like to grow up in that situation. If you have any questions, don't be afraid to ask!

name: Dylan Davidson
bio: What's up! I'm Dylan and currently I'm a shadowing a doctor while I work my way up through medical school. If you ever want to talk about the Seahawks and learn about the bones in your feet, im your guy!

name: Ethan Erickson
bio: Hi, my name is Ethan and I'm a music producer here in Seattle. All my life I really enjoyed music and playing instruments. It helped me get through school a lot of the times. Don't be afraid to send me any music you guys make!
